short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen capture your current page in entirety and reliably!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clarity PPM solution has Roadmaps with Timeline and Board view. This extension will allow the user to take a screen print of that page and print it as PDF or an Image. Version 5.0.14
